snippet: The disaster underscores the need to diversify our crops.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof William G Moseley charges that massive drought in the Midwest underscores America's dangerous over-reliance on corn, which is highly susceptible to drought, as well as the need to diversify its crops; holds country's vulnerable agri-food system can be changed by retooling federal farm and corn-based ethanol subsidy programs.
lead_paragraph: The disaster underscores the need to diversify our crops.

headline.main: The Silver Lining in the Drought
headline.print_headline: The Silver Lining in the Drought
